meanings.definition: A person who lacks courage or is easily frightened.
meanings.sent1: The cowards ran away when they heard a loud noise.
meanings.sent2: The town was full of cowards who were afraid of their own shadows.
meanings.sent3: The cowards were so scared of the tiny spider that they screamed and ran away.
meanings.sent4: In the face of danger, the cowards always choose to flee rather than face their fears.
meanings.sent5: The image of the cowards trembling in fear will forever be etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of courage or determination.
meanings.sent1: The cowardly lion in the story was afraid of everything.
meanings.sent2: Her cowardly behavior made her miss out on many exciting opportunities.
meanings.sent3: Despite his cowardly nature, he managed to muster up the courage to speak in front of the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The cowardly decision to give up without even trying disappointed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The cowardly act of backing down from a challenge is never a sign of strength.
